explanation: [0-0] A giant man in a suit, wearing a crown, stands in an open space in front of a building. He bends down slightly, looking down, with his left arm in front of him. A streetlight shines on his left side.

[0-10] The man raises his left arm and swings it up and down twice, and then his neck is seen to lengthen. He continues to wave his arms, jumps up with his feet raised, and then the camera pulls back to reveal that the man is standing on a flight of steps with a square hole below. A black hand then reaches out from the hole, and the man above continues to wave his arms, his neck now back to its normal state, talking all the time. He then looks down. Then the camera pans right to reveal a full moon in the sky, with a green circle flashing next to it. The camera continues to pan right as a helicopter flies in and drops a robot in a black suit, which falls into the square hole.

[10-19] The hole then flashes with blue light and shakes violently before exploding. The picture then cuts to a robot with a bayonet on its arm fighting the man opposite, who reaches out and punches the robot before jumping up and kicking it with both feet, as a green circle of light in the air flashes continuously and the man is swallowed up by it.
